#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
//#include<conio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{ int t,n,count1=0,count2=0,x=0,y=0,i;

 
  
 int ar[4]={0,15,30,40};  
    cin>>t;
 while(t--)
 {cin>>n;
 if(n>0)
 {char temp[n];
// char temp[n];gets(temp);
  
  scanf("%s",temp);
  for(i=0;i<n;i++)
   {   if(temp[i]=='S')
       count1++;
       else
       count2++;
       if(count1==4)
       {x++;count1=0;count2=0;}
        if(count2==4)
       {y++;count2=0;count1=0;}
    }
  
 cout<<x<<"-"<<y;
  if(count1>0||count2>0)
 cout<<","<<ar[count1]<<"-"<<ar[count2];
 x=0;y=0;count1=0;count2=0;
 cout<<"\n";
}}//getch();
}
